Kenji has a box full of candies.

He flips a coin 40 times.

Each time he gets heads, he takes out 8 candies from the box. Each time he gets tails, he adds 5 candies to the box. He originally had 30 candies, and after 40 coin tosses, he ends up with 194 candies.

How many times did he get heads?

- Add the number of apples in each box.

- Simple addition!
